explanation: The page provides information and documents related to new agricultural subsidy measures starting in 2023.
The page contains forms and a guide for employers regarding the online payroll accounting for withholding tax.
The page provides an overview of the withholding tax system for foreign workers in the canton, including regulations and FAQs.
The page offers a tax calculator for property gains tax and provides forms and guidelines for declaration.
The page provides forms and guidelines for the tax declaration of 2022 for individuals and self-employed persons.

The page provides forms and guidelines for the tax declaration of 2020 for individuals and self-employed persons.

The page provides tax declaration forms and instructions for associations, foundations, and other legal entities for the year 2019.
